page.title: 09Mr. Roe - Farmer
page.content: Mr Roe owns two farms, one of his farms is called Canons Farm, and the other is call Perrotts Farm. He owns 500 acres of land. 250 acres are for crops, wheat and barley. He also owns 250 head of cattle; 104 cows, 145 followers of beefers and dairy. There are 108 acres of permanent pasture and 7 acres of temporary lays. He has no drainage system in his fields; all his fields are naturally drained. His farm consists of every type of soil ie. clay, chalk and flint. Mr Roe has lots of modern equipment. He has 1 combine harvester, 2 balers, 2 corn drills, 2 sprayers, 2 fertilizers, 4 ploughs, 2 muck spreaders, 2 sets of rollers and 2 heavy rollers. Mr Roe employs 3 people, 1 herdsman, 1 tractor driver and 1 back-up person. Originally the fields were 5-6 acres but now 18 acres. The farm house is 95 years old.
